channel.title: CoreUI for Vue.js Changelog on CoreUI
channel.description: Recent content in CoreUI for Vue.js Changelog on CoreUI

item.title: CoreUI for Vue v5.0.0-rc.2
item.description: We are delighted to present CoreUI for Vue v5.0.0-rc.2, our latest update as of March 10, 2024. This version focuses on refining the CoreUI components for Vue, providing style improvements and essential fixes to ensure developers have the best tools at their disposal for creating dynamic, responsive Vue applications.
